LoggerForcedLog Method (Type, Level, Object, Exception)Apache log4net™ SDK Documentation
Creates a new logging event and logs the event without further checks.

virtual void ForcedLog(
	Type^ callerStackBoundaryDeclaringType, 
	Level^ level,

)
abstract ForcedLog : 
        callerStackBoundaryDeclaringType : Type *

override ForcedLog : 
        callerStackBoundaryDeclaringType : Type * 
        level : Level * 
        message : Object * 
        exception : Exception -> unit

Parameters

callerStackBoundaryDeclaringType
Type: SystemType
The declaring type of the method that is the stack boundary into the logging system for this call.
level
Type: log4net.CoreLevel
The level of the message to be logged.
message
Type: SystemObject
The message object to log.
exception
Type: SystemException
The exception to log, including its stack trace.
Remarks

Generates a logging event and delivers it to the attached appenders.
